CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 이동 if self.Entity.Common.is_left == true then self.Entity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(self.direct,0),delta) else self.Entity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(-(self.direct),0),delta) end
-- 수명이 다하면 삭제 self.currentLifeTime = self.currentLifeTime - delta if self.currentLifeTime <= 0 then self.Entity.Enable = false end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnEnterTriggerBody
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if (enterEvent.TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_left ~= self.Entity.Common.is_left) and enterEvent.TriggerBodyEntity.Common.is_neutral == false then self.direct = 0 -- 멈추고 self.currentLifeTime = 0.6 local Xpos = self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position.x local Ypos = self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position.y self.Entity.Enable = false local parent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map01") if self.Entity.Common.is_left == true then local bang_left = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://ec7bdb21-5c92-4d06-a243-66e30b5a8c48", "MiniBoomBang", Vector3(Xpos,Ypos,0), parent) -- 리소스 바꾸기 bang_left:Destroy(1.2) else local bang_right = _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId("model://441a810a-fb52-44f5-bd5e-f2131e5acbba","AndroidBoomBang",Vector3(Xpos,Ypos,0),parent) bang_right:Destroy(1.2) end end
